title: Maycee Barber rips Paige VanZant for ignoring her, calling out 'girl power union'
text:
The Maycee Barber and Paige VanZant saga continues.

After Barber (8-0 MMA, 3-0 UFC) relentlessly called out VanZant (8-4 MMA, 5-3 UFC) before and after her recent win over Gillian Robertson at UFC on ESPN 6, “PVZ” came out with a list, issuing a challenge to 62 female fighters, but not Barber, trying to prove a point about respect.

But “The Future” is not here for respect, she said. She’s looking for a dance partner, and said if VanZant is looking for a fight, as well, then she should just sign on the dotted line.

Barber took to social media to respond to VanZant and proceeded to list the entire female roster herself (via Instagram):

All right so I’m out here at the (UFC) PI getting my recovery in, and this thing, my little phone here just keeps blowing up about Paige VanZant trying to get a fight. She keeps going on and on about this respect, and this trying to get a girl from her girl power union to come out and fight her in the cage, and listen Paige, I’m not looking to go out there and fight you out of respect. I’m looking to go out there and sign a contract with another girl and have her actually show up, and I saw your thing on TMZ about begging Dana for a fight and listen, Dana White, TMZ, Paige VanZant, I’m right here. I’ve been waiting. So either sign the contract and show up, otherwise give me a contract with someone with the last name VanZant

Barber is coming off a first round finish over Robertson at UFC on ESPN 6 that extended the unbeaten start to her career.

She called out VanZant afterward, but clearly she’s not the only 125-pounder looking to get a crack at PVZ. Numerous strawweight and flyweight fighters have called her out, but in a more respectful manner that could apparently lure “12 Gauge” into a fight.

Or you can meet me there December 14th? 🤔 https://t.co/ShlMA3GHV5 — BriannaTheBull (@briannathebull) October 9, 2019

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.
description: Maycee Barber fires back at Paige VanZant and is not here to fight her out of respect.
